market value.translation[0].definitions[: the value of a product, building etc based on the price that people are willing to pay for it, rather than the cost of producing it or building it
the total value of all the shares on a stock market, or the value of a particular company’s shares
market value.translation[1].definitions[: how much people would be willing to pay for something, rather than a value calculated in another way
The survey compared the market value of similar properties in different parts of the country.
the total value of all the shares on a stockmarket, or the value of the shares of a particular company
The current market value of the firm’s equity finance is £1 million.
